mapper.select: select userId,userName,userPassword,userEmail,userType,userLoginIp,userIp from tb_user join tb_user_ip on tb_user_ip.userNameForIp=tb_user.userName where tb_user.userName=#{userName} and tb_user.userPassword=#{userPassword}
select userId from tb_user where userName=#{userName}
select userId from tb_user where userEmail=#{userEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (userName, userPassword, userEmail, userLoginIp, userType, userLoginTime) values (#{userName},#{userPassword},#{userEmail},#{userIp},'user',#{userLoginTime})
insert into tb_user_info (userName, userNickName, userGender, userAge, userBirthday, userSign, userFaceUuid) values (#{userName},'','','','','','default.png')
insert into tb_user_index (indexUserName, indexLike, indexVisit, indexMessage) values (#{userName},0,0,0)
